DOC.brief_summary: Post-operative administration of ulimorelin is expected to reduce time to recovery of Gastrointestinal (GI) function in patients who have undergone partial large bowel resection.
DOC.brief_title: Ulimorelin Study of Efficacy and Safety (ULISES 007)
DOC.criteria: Men or women, 18 to 80 years of age, inclusive Scheduled to undergo open bowel resection with colonic anastomosis. For women who can potentially become pregnant a pregnancy test at screening and admission must be negative. Weight more than 200kg (441 pounds) Pregnant or breastfeeding Known history of drug or alcohol abuse within the previous year.
